On the Wednesday edition of Breitbart News Daily, broadcast live on SiriusXM Patriot Channel 125 from 6AM to 9AM Eastern, Breitbart Editor-in-Chief Alex Marlow will continue our discussion of the issues animating the presidential race.

Public Interest Law Professor John Banzhaf of George Washington University Law School will discuss how states are fighting a losing battle against the federalization of elections to combat vote hacking concerns.
Frank Gaffney of the Center for Security Policy will discuss Monday night’s debate, as well as his warning not to surrender Internet domain control from American supervision to an international body.

SiriusXM Vice President for news and talk Dave Gorab called the show “the conservative news show of record.”

Follow Breitbart News on Twitter for live updates during the show.
Live from London, Rome, and Jerusalem, Breitbart correspondents will provide updates on the latest international news.
Breitbart News Daily is the first live, conservative radio enterprise to air seven days a week.
Veteran pollster Pat Caddell will break down the latest election polls for us.
Listeners may call into the show at: 866-957-2874.
